CoEx Policy: Supplier Creation

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1973&user=10620> 	

Accurate, compliant supplier data is vital for smooth operations, risk management, and strong partnerships. To support this, we‚Äôve introduced a standardized process for registering and updating all suppliers. Records must be verified, documented, and approved in the ERP before any transactions.

This process applies to all supplier types and defines clear roles across Finance, Procurement, and MDM. Every change is auditable, ensuring transparency and accountability.

By following the process, we ensure compliance, faster onboarding, fewer errors, and stronger collaboration. Non-compliance may cause payment delays, escalation, or disciplinary action.

This session will dive into the future of Retail-Tech & Circularity, & Saudi's Vision 2030, bringing together entrepreneurs, innovators, and industry speakers for an evening of bold ideas and real conversations.

Back to the City With Tryano


 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1978&user=10620> 	

When the temperatures drop, the city awakens. In the Middle East, fall and winter bring a long-awaited return to vibrant city life. Streets hum with energy, rooftops reopen, and style steps out of air-conditioned shadows as life moves outdoors. Offices and classrooms fill once more, routines fall into rhythm, and fashion takes the spotlight.This season, Power Dressing commands attention, Earth Tones ground wardrobes in warmth, and High-Contrast Monochrome transforms the city into a bold, modern style canvas.


For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1979&user=10620>
